This is another change in behavior that might be worth noting in the commit message or release notes: that specifiying -maxtxfee will now result in an error in non-wallet builds.

I can see how it makes sense to disable this particular warning about the `-minrelaytxfee` setting in non-wallet builds even though it is not a wallet setting, because the warning message is about wallet behavior.\n\nBut would it make sense to to keep some warning about really high -minrelaytxfee settings even in non-wallet builds?
